document_data.mainbody:
achinations of a Red Wizard was a book written by Celemir of Procampur. It was about the Red Wizards of Thay.Given the nature of the collection, this book may also have topics related to warcraft and battle strategy.
Cedric Ravajar owned a copy at the Vipers Nest in the Vast in 1369 DR. This was worth 75 gp.
